description.plain:
Dillon Hart Francis is an American EDM artist who’s worked with many artist over the years such as DJ Snake, Martin Garrix, Calvin Harris & Diplo. After his rise to fame, Dillon eventually collaborated with Diplo on song “Que Que,” which has blossomed into an even greater friendship.

In Dillon’s free time he often makes Snapchat Skits or streams on his Twitch channel.

body.plain:
Dillon Hart Francis is an American EDM artist who’s worked with many artist over the years such as DJ Snake, Martin Garrix, Calvin Harris & Diplo. After his rise to fame, Dillon eventually collaborated with Diplo on song “Que Que,” which has blossomed into an even greater friendship.

In Dillon’s free time he often makes Snapchat Skits or streams on his Twitch channel.

songs.full_title: Say Less by Dillon Francis (Ft. G-Eazy)
songs.title: Say Less

description.plain:
After what felt like a lifetime of teasing, Dillon Francis & G-Eazy have finally pulled back the curtains and dropped their collaboration, “Say Less.“

G-Eazy returns to his “Lady Killers”-attitude in this song to discuss picking up girls and partying hard.

This song demonstrates Dillon’s versatility as a producer by being able to make a hip-hop tune that quickly transforms into a festival Trap hit.

“Say Less” has been in the works for quite some time, as Dillon & G-Eazy first expressed interest in working together in 2013, to hinting at studio time in 2015, and finally wrapping up the track late 2016. It’s no surprise that the two of the hottest artists in EDM and rap have come together.

songs.embed_content: Read “Say Less” by Dillon Francis on Genius

songs.artist_names: Dillon Francis (Ft. Totally Enormous Extinct Dinosaurs)
songs.full_title: Without You by Dillon Francis (Ft. Totally Enormous Extinct Dinosaurs)
songs.title: Without You
songs.title_with_featured: Without You (Ft. Totally Enormous Extinct Dinosaurs)

description.plain:
Without You is written by Totally Enormous Extinct Dinosaurs , and is about the relationship problems Dillion Francis was going through at the time.

It is about going through a break up and learning how to recover from being without a person. The video is unique and flips through time of a girl tossing and turning on her bed  while remembering her lover is not next to her. Her t-shirt is a continued transitioning point where the frame becomes the picture on her shirt and has the lyrics on it.

songs.embed_content: Read “Without You” by Dillon Francis on Genius

songs.full_title: Anywhere by Dillon Francis (Ft. Will Heard)
songs.title: Anywhere

description.plain: Dillon Francis is back after a break in similar career. The american producer continues to work on his next musical project, the successor This Mixtape Is Fire EP released in 2015. And now, Dillon released a new track “Anywhere” that brings collaboration on Will Heard’s vocals.
